title: Hero: Form summary
code:
<form style="width: 450px">
  <gds-flex flex-direction="column" gap="m">
    <input
      id="designation"
      type="text"
      aria-invalid="true"
      data-label="Designation"
      data-errormessage="A designation is required"
      required=""
      hidden
    />
    <gds-form-summary id="summary"></gds-form-summary>
  </gds-flex>
</form>
